dict.acceptation: 缺席，缺勤；缺乏，缺少，无；心不在焉，不注意；

sent.orig: Doubts also come from fans of the aphorism absence of evidence is not evidence of absence.
sent.trans: 有人抱持怀疑的态度，是因为服膺[有证据不等于[有]。

sent.orig: A short absence quickens love, a long absence kill it.
sent.trans: 短暂的离别会促进爱情，长久的分离却会扼杀爱情。

sent.orig: Absence of evidence is not evidence absence, is an important rule to remember in scientific investigation.
sent.trans: “缺乏证据不等于没有证据”是科学调查要记住的一个重要的规则。

sent.orig: But absence of evidence at the factory and elsewhere is not evidence of absence.
sent.trans: 然而，在这家工厂和其他地方缺乏证据并非没有证据。

sent.orig: Absence of more than two first premolars or absence of a first and a second premolar.
sent.trans: 缺少超过两个第一前臼齿或者一个第一和一个第二前臼齿。
